definition: lit. the Big Dipper 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1] has turned and the stars have moved/time flies/also written 星移斗轉|星移斗转[xing1 yi2 Dou3 zhuan3]
abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
variant of 鬭|斗[dou4]
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]
variant of 鬥|斗[dou4]
variant of 鬥|斗[dou4]
see 轉文|转文[zhuai3 wen2]
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
star/heavenly body/satellite/small amount
to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove

sentences.english: Time goes by and the World Expo has gone through 158 years.
sentences.chinese: 斗转星移，世博会已经走过了158个春秋。

sentences.english: Our planet rotates on its axis, creating cycles of day and night.
sentences.chinese: 地球斗转星移，形成周期的白天和黑夜。

sentences.english: Bottle turn the star moves, years alternate, old E Er is much this now is changed new colour.
sentences.chinese: 斗转星移，岁月更迭，古老的鄂尔多斯今朝换新颜。

sentences.english: Inexorably, time rapid, since then, we have will face looking for a job.
sentences.chinese: 斗转星移，时光飞速，转眼间，我们已将面临找工作。

sentences.english: Time flies and 30 years have passed before one realizes it.
sentences.chinese: 斗转星移，春来秋去，转眼间30年过去了。

sentences.english: How time flies, it has been ten years since the last time I saw him.
sentences.chinese: 时光荏苒，斗转星移，许多年就这样过去了。

definition: lit. the blue sea turned into mulberry fields (idiom)/fig. the transformations of the world
lit. the Big Dipper 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1] has turned and the stars have moved/time flies/also written 斗轉星移|斗转星移[Dou3 zhuan3 xing1 yi2]
lit. a white cloud transforms into what looks like a gray dog (idiom)/fig. the unpredictable changeability of the world
the sun and moon like a shuttle (idiom); How time flies!
time flies (idiom)
the passage of the years/the flow of time
a white steed flits past a crack (idiom); How time flies!
time flies like an arrow (idiom); How time flies!
changeable situation (idiom)
things change with the passage of time (idiom)
the sun and moon/day and month/every day and every month/season/life and livelihood
in a flash (idiom)
as time goes by (idiom)
lit. (cloud shapes) changing from a white shirt to a gray dog (idiom)/fig. the unpredictable changeability of the world
a snap of the fingers/a short moment/in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
changes/vicissitudes
